resources.string: This is an app designed to test the Cognitive Abilities of old-age citizens, and any other individuals who are facing symptoms of degeneration of their cognitive abilities, thereby making them potential candidates for this test. The test has 3 sections. Please listen to the instructions for each section carefully. At any point in time, if you feel that you need to listen to the instructions again, please click on the Read Again Button.
"Please remember these images shown for futher questions"
"Spell the following word being read out to you backwards "
